briefdescription.para: Set whether panel movement is locked or not.
Set visibility of panel's highlighted border, mostly used for showing panel focus.
If enabled, sends signal CloseRequested() when the user closes instead of closing.

detaileddescription.para: Defaults to FALSE. Use this to override default panel closing functionality.

briefdescription.para: Called whenever this panel is focused and user uses "Zoom In" (either in menus or as a keyboard shortcut)

detaileddescription.para: This function is up to the Panel's interpretation of what the user intends to zoom into. Default behavior is a no-op.

briefdescription.para: Called whenever this panel is focused and user uses "Zoom Out" (either in menus or as a keyboard shortcut)

detaileddescription.para: This function is up to the Panel's interpretation of what the user intends to zoom out of. Default behavior is a no-op.

briefdescription.para: Called whenever this panel is focused and user uses "Play/Pause" (either in menus or as a keyboard shortcut)

detaileddescription.para: This function is up to the Panel's interpretation of what the user intends to zoom out of. Default behavior is a no-op.

briefdescription.para: Internal function that sets the QDockWidget's window title whenever the title/subtitle change.

detaileddescription.para: Should be called any time a change is made to title_ or subtitle_
Use this function to set the title of the panel.
A PanelWidget has the default format of "Title: Subtitle" (can differ depending on translation). If no Subtitle is set, the title will just be formatted "Title".

parameterdescription.para: String to set the title to

detaileddescription.para: Use this function to set the subtitle of the panel.
A PanelWidget has the default format of "Title: Subtitle" (can differ depending on translation). If no Subtitle is set, the title will just be formatted "Title".

parameterdescription.para: String to set the subtitle to

briefdescription.para: A PanelWidget wrapper around a TaskView widget.
